name: The Legendary Super Saiyan
description:
The Legendary Super Saiyan is an anime RPG game with Goku, Vegeta, Trunks and all your favorite characters, which also beautifully reproduced in pixel style. In the game, you can grow up with Super Saiyan Goku, take risks, and save the earth!

The original character plot, reproduce the classic pixel style!
-Summon your favorite character, training followed by the master from the earth, and transform into the super Saiyan.
-Create your own team, plan your battle strategy is the key to defeat the enemies you encounter on the journey!

Simple game experience, create your own legend!
-The new on-hook mode is online, and there are new discoveries every time you go online.
-A variety of PVP, PVE, team play, real-time update of global player rankings.
-Log in for seven consecutive days to get SSR Super Saiyan Goku, Broly, and more rewards are waiting for you!

Come to become the Super Saiyan and create your own legend!
